1574480.name: Agent 64: Spies Never Die
1574480.description:
Immerse yourself in a thrilling retro first-person shooter experience that pays homage to the beloved console shooters of the 90s. Step into an adrenaline-fueled world where you'll embark on daring missions, traverse captivating landscapes, and engage in pulse-pounding battles against cutting-edge enemy AI straight out of the futuristic realm of 1997.

A heart-pumping journey through a realm of espionage and non-stop action that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Story Mode:

A story campaign made up of 14 missions.

Each story mission is a self contained environment where you have to accomplish varied objectives, such as hacking terminals, steal secret plans, free civilian hostages and much more. All the while fighting armed guards in epic shootouts.

Every missions can be done in 3 distinct difficulty modes. With difficulty comes more objectives and more open areas to discover. 

It is strongly recommended to start missions in Agent mode first to familiarize yourself with the missions first, and then discover what comes next.

Paradox Mode:

By beating par times and other trials, you can unlock paradox modes. Paradoxes are modifiers and cheats that can have a lot of various effects on the regular gameplay.

Contracts:

Contracts are remixed missions with different objectives and presets of paradox modes to spice up the challenge. Completing each will unlock paradoxes and more.

Co-operative:

Play the entire story campaign with friends, either in local split-screen or online!

Arena:

Play various PvP modes against friends or bots, or both. Online mode goes up to 8 players and 8 bots. Full lobby customization with any kind of teams, weapon set, rule sets and paradox modifiers you wish, you can save up to 10 presets to your liking.

Arena game modes:

  • Deathmatch: Classic deathmatch, score the more frags to win!

  • Briefcase: Capture the briefcase and hold it for long enough to score a point. But don't get too comfortable, after each point won, the briefcase position is reset to a random point on the map.

  • Zone: You have to capture the zone on the map to score points. Don't let any enemy contest it as it will stall the countdown!

Challenges:

Prove you're the master of the arena with those unique trials. Playable solo or with online/local friends. 

Each challenge is a special match against preset bots, you have to reach a precise score under a certain amount of time, the faster and the most efficient you are, the better the prizes. Unlock maps, characters, music tracks, and more!

John Walter, ex special agent, is thrown back into action to save the world once more. Protect the future against the phantoms of the past. 

Be the most elite operative the world has ever seen!
